name: Museum Skillz
description:
Explore various museum professions with AGO experts, including archivists, conservators, and writers.

April 16, 2025
Join the communications team to learn how social media and press releases are developed in a museum setting.

April 23, 2025
Lab Tour – Meet the conservators caring for AGO artworks, see their current projects, and discover their tools and training.

April 30, 2025
Conservation Skillz – Get hands-on with conservation techniques as specialists introduce you to their methods.

May 7, 2025
Join librarians and archivists for a tour of the Edward P. Taylor Library & Archives, featuring behind-the-scenes insights and rare materials from the vault.
